home.title: WHERE IDEAS MEET INSIGHTS
home.description: We hope you find something here that interests you. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

blog.title: BLOG
blog.description: Welcome to our blog! We inspire and inform, offering unique insights into contemporary topics from experts across various fields

about.title: ABOUT US
about.description: Here you can find all about us, our team, and our mission.

works.title: OUR WORKS
works.description: Here you can find all our works, from books to articles, and more. You can also find here GitHub repositories and other resources.

authors.title: OUR AUTHORS
authors.description: Here you can find all our authors, and their works. You can also find their social media profiles and contact information.

contact.title: CONTACT US
contact.description: We would love to hear from you! Please fill out the form below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

404.title: ERROR 404
404.description: The page you are looking for does not exist. Please check the URL and try again.
